title: Create Feature Folder Structure
description: Define the barrel exports for feature modules to enable clean imports.
instructions:
Create barrel export files for the auth and chat features that:

1. Export all public classes from data/, domain/, and presentation/ subdirectories
2. Use proper relative imports
3. Include a doc comment explaining what the feature does
4. Follow the 'export package' pattern for clean imports

Create both auth.dart and chat.dart barrel files.

hints.text: Use 'export' statements to re-export files from subdirectories
The 'library' directive names the library for documentation purposes
Group exports by layer (data, domain, presentation) with comments for organization

commonMistakes.consequence: Exposes private APIs that may change, creating breaking changes
commonMistakes.correction: Only export public APIs. Use 'show' to limit what's exported: export 'file.dart' show PublicClass;

commonMistakes.consequence: Causes compilation errors or confusing dependencies
commonMistakes.correction: Features should not import from each other directly. Use shared/ for common models.
